mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT title,id,price,buyNum,score,releaseDate,num FROM buyList WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY id DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND ${endRowNum}
select NVL(MAX(ROWNUM),0) FROM buyList WHERE id LIKE '%${id}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO buyList(title, id, price, buyNum, score, releaseDate,num,regdate) VALUES (#{title},#{id},#{price},#{buyNum},#{score},#{releaseDate},buylist_seq.NEXTVAL, sysdate)
insert into refund_list(num, title, id, price, regdate) values(#{num},#{title},#{id},#{price},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, title, id, price, regdate FROM refund_list ORDER BY regdate asc) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND ${endRowNum}
select NVL(MAX(ROWNUM),0) FROM buyList WHERE id LIKE '%${id}%' and title LIKE '%${title}%'
